title: Tennis Stars Want More Money and a Voice
summary: Top tennis players like Aryna Sabalenka and Jannik Sinner are asking for more prize money and a bigger say in decisions at big tournaments called Grand Slams. Even though prize money has increased, such as at the Australian Open, players feel they are not getting enough. They want tournaments to pay them a fair share of the money they earn. Players have sent letters and had meetings to talk about this. They are working together in a campaign to make things better for all tennis players.

background_read: Tennis is a sport where players hit a ball over a net. Top players compete in big tournaments called Grand Slams, like Wimbledon and the US Open. They win prize money for playing well. Sometimes, players think they should get more money and have a say in how tournaments are run. This article talks about players asking for changes to make tennis fairer for everyone.
